page.title: 10A day in my life
page.content: I am a family of three,a sister and a brother.I get up at 6.30am go riding at 7.00am and come back at 8.00am,then I go inside and get change for school, after that I have breakfast and watch breakfast T.V. then practice my piano until ten to nine when I go to school. At school I read until assembly.After assembly we do English.Playtime is at half past ten.We do maths until dinner time,we had mash potatoes and fish. When dinner has finished we go out to play. After lunch we read, then do our topics until playtime after play a teacher reads us a story about monsters. Instead of having a story some of us play the guitar. We go home at half past,on Wed nesday I go to my piano lesson. When I get home I go riding then out to play until supper I practice my guitar at 6 o'clock. I go to bed at 9 o'clock.
